summary: This API support to let sellers to update the shop name, shop logo, and shop description
description: This API support to let sellers to update the shop name, shop logo, and shop description.

query.name: warehouse_type
query.description: Type of warehouse. Applicable values: - 1: Pickup Warehouse - 2: Return Warehouse Default value is 1 (Pickup Warehouse)

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/shop/get_warehouse_detail?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&region=ID&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: The error key if there's error.

schema.name: message
schema.sample: Your shop is not in multi-warehouse whitelist.
schema.description: Messages about the error and it's cause if there're errors. It will be just return the updated information if there's no error.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: warehouse_id
schema.description: Warehouse address identifier. It should be unique for every warehouse address

schema.name: warehouse_name
schema.description: The warehouse name filled in when creating the warehouse address

schema.name: warehouse_type
schema.description: Type of warehouse. Applicable values: - 1: Pickup Warehouse - 2: Return Warehouse

schema.name: location_id
schema.description: Location identifier for stocks. Different location_ids represent that your addresses are in different item stocks

schema.name: address
schema.description: Detail address of your warehouse address

schema.name: town
schema.sample: Av Maria H A dos Santos

schema.name: state_code
schema.description: State code of your warehouse address

schema.name: holiday_mode_state
schema.description: The holiday mode state of your address. 0: not in holiday mode 1: holiday mode active 2: holiday mode is turning of 3: holiday mode is turning on

examples.code:
{
	"request_id": "16488d76e337c606s5504f26",
	"error": "warehouse.error_not_in_whitelist",
	"message": "Your shop is not in multi-warehouse whitelist.",
	"response": [
		{
			"warehouse_id": 6,
			"warehouse_name": "warehouse1",
                        "warehouse_type": 1,
			"location_id": "IDZ",
                        "address_id": 118454205,
			"region": "ID",
			"state": "ACEH",
			"city": "KAB. ACEH UTARA",
			"district": "Mato Grosso",
			"town": "Av Maria H A dos Santos",
			"address": "Parque Sagrada Família",
			"zipcode": "24379",
			"state_code": "12345",
			"holiday_mode_state": 0
		}
	]
}

error_codes.message: This error will show if there is no legal warehouse address for given shop id
This error will show if your shop has no permission to access multi-warehouse
This error will show if region is missing.
This error will show if region is not in ID, PH, VN, SG, TW, MX
This error will show if shop id is missing.
